thread.title: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio Outlines Plan for Second Term

author: Mara Gay
title: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio Outlines Plan for Second Term
text:
New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio on Tuesday laid out a vision for his second term that offered little in the way of new initiatives and doubled down on the liberal positions he has staked out in years past.
Speaking before a large crowd at the Kings Theatre in Brooklyn, a lush, gold-gilded space with soaring ceilings, Mr. de Blasio said the longstanding policies of his administration, from creating more affordable housing to instituting universal prekindergarten and paid sick leave, would make the city fairer.
...
